title: When i report someone, DO NOT MATCH THEM UP WITH ME AGAIN
body:
Look at this player, just walking up mid - http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=manglikofshire

After playing a terrible game where she ran up mid I have to play another with her? If I report someone I shouldnt be put into matchmaking with them again. I quit the second game and I will get punished for leaving. Such BS.

replies.body: If you report someone for verbal abuse or they are trolling you should not have to play with them again. Look at the person profile, they have been trolling games for a few days and they are still not banned. I would bet they have a few hundred reports too. The system is broken. fortunately I did not get a warning for leaving the game. They went 0/30 on the game I left. Another option would be to allow us to surrender after one minute if things like this happen.

Got the same problem, getting matched sometimes 5 times in a row with someone i reported 5 times in a row....
Then there are the "but duuuuhuuude, i am challenjour, imagine me ignore all!" 
ye, just don't let me play the next 5 rounds with them and I'm fine, or place him in enemy team.
Then there are the "but duuuuhuuuude just wait 5 minutes, do not start another gaaahame!". You can do that, but still, it is purely retarded to get matched with these guys in the very next round again.

Anyway, you will get flamed here because you don't want to play another round with a troll :3

EDIT: Ooooh the first challenjour dude was allready there lmao :D

It's not going to be implemented because it adds more incentives to report people just for playing bad (which already happens quite a bit).

May as well report everyone who does bad in your games so that it is more likely they'll be on the enemy team next game.

Meanwhile, there's already a very simple solution of waiting a couple minutes before queuing again (at least for everyone that's not challenger :^)

> [{quoted}](name=Spreek,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=2Wj9Izoz,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-07-02T10:39:04.437+0000)
> 
> May as well report everyone who does bad in your games so that it is more likely they'll be on the enemy team next game.

What would be bad with this? He is in my MMR Range, so he might is not bad, I had a bad time with him, so getting matched up with him lowers our team strength by a ton.

The enemy team on the other hand does not have my experience from the last game, so it does not lower their team strength.
It would be just more comfortable, than waiting until he leaves the endscreen, and wait another 5 minutes after that.

But ye, everyone that happen to not have that luck getting matched with someone who went fullretard lastgame at least once ,thinks they way you do, I guess...

Because the report system is designed for players who are breaking the rules, not players who are simply bad/above their true MMR/had a bad game.

It would flood the report system with a bunch of players who don't deserve to be banned.

> But ye, everyone that happen to not have that luck getting matched with someone who went fullretard lastgame at least once ,thinks they way you do, I guess...

lol. in high elo you get stuck with the same people you dislike constantly. I've played with some people I dislike 5-10 times. So I understand where you are coming from, but this is not the way to solve it.

It's not about someone you just dislike, its about flamers and toxic guys.
But I can understand that some will use it to just report everyone they just dislike.
Well, guess we have to play in teams, we never even would think of playing with in real live.
Kinda bad game design IMHO, but I cannot come up with a better one.

Sadly, dodging a queue does punish you, so you aren't even allowed to choose...
On the bright side you get to report them again! :D
What if blocking someone only prevented them from being placed in your next game? and they had to be in your last game to get "blocked"

Picture this scenario

I'm a challenger player

Someone's better than me?  REPORT/IGNORE

Someone beat me in game?  REPORT/IGNORE


I don't want to play this person ever again?  REPORT/IGNORE

I want to be #1?  REPORT/IGNORE ALL OF CHALLENGER
